short_summary: 1 Intermediate Technical Clerk for tactical Aviation and Simulation (TA&S) 2-4.
description: This requirement is for the provision of one (1) Intermediate Technical Clerk to perform Aircraft Maintenance Control Record Specialist services to support the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DAEPM), Tactical Aviation and Extraction (DSATC) located at the Ottawa International Airport or other DND and Government of Canada buildings.  The contract will be awarded to the bidder who meets the security requirements and complies with Treasury Board directives.
